search_results.title: Joe Holley, Native Texan
search_results.snippet: Joe Holley has been the “Native Texan” columnist for the Houston Chronicle since 2013. A native Texan himself – from Waco – he's been an editorial page editor ...

search_results.title: Joe Holley - The Wittliff Collections - Texas State University
search_results.snippet: Joe Holley is an award-winning author of several books, as well as a longtime journalist who was a finalist for the Pulitzer Prize in 2017.

search_results.title: Joe Holley
search_results.snippet: Joe Holley is on the Houston Chronicle staff, where he serves on the editorial board and writes a weekly column. He is the author of Hometown Texas.
